snippet.title: Wild Cat Robot running faster than a Cheetah!! Boston Dynamics 2013
snippet.description:
Wild Cat Robot running faster than a Cheetah!! Boston Dynamics 2013
Toegevoegd door MisterSexyBuzz laatste oktober
Boston Dynamics and DARPA collaborate to create state-of-the-art robots that may have utility in the military, such as for search and rescue missions. They are famous online for their impressive Big Dog and humanoid ‘bots. Now, they have just introduced their latest ‘animal’ in the robotic pack: the WildCat.
1 372 views

snippet.title: MARATHON WATCH: Hoyts Running Boston For Last Time
snippet.description:
MARATHON WATCH: Hoyts Running Boston For Last Time
Toegevoegd door wochit vorig maandag
Dick and Rick Hoyt are among the most recognizable faces at the Boston Marathon. Rick has cerebral palsy and his father, Dick, pushes him along the course in a wheelchair every year. They've completed Boston 30 times. They're so beloved that there's a statue in their honor in Hopkinton, where the race starts. They didn't get to finish last year because of the bombing.
4 views

snippet.title: Boston Marathon runner trades running the race for protecting it
snippet.description:
Boston Marathon runner trades running the race for protecting it
Toegevoegd door CBS News vorig maandag
In January, Bill Evans became Boston's police commissioner after three decades on the force. He has run in the Boston Marathon 18 times, but this year he won't be able to because he is in charge of protecting it. Jeff Glor reports.
2 views

snippet.title: Running for Boston
snippet.description:
Running for Boston
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste oktober
This year at the annual RunAPalozza in Asbury Park, N.J., participants were not only running for the Special Olympics and the recovery of the Jersey Shore, but also in honor and support of those impacted by the terrorist attack in Boston.
48 views

snippet.description:
Assassin's Creed III [PC] Playthrough (#1) - Running To Boston !

snippet.title: London marathoner running for Boston
snippet.description:
London marathoner running for Boston
Toegevoegd door CBS News laatste oktober
Tatyana McFadden competed in Boston's wheelchair marathon the day it was bombed, but plans to compete in London's marathon as well saying she's "dedicating the whole weekend to the people of Boston." Mark Phillips reports.
57 views

snippet.title: Manitobans Running in the Boston Marathon Share Their Reactions to a Pair of Bomb Explosions That Killed Three People and Injured Many Others.
snippet.description:
Manitobans Running in the Boston Marathon Share Their Reactions to a Pair of Bomb Explosions That Killed Three People and Injured Many Others.
Toegevoegd door tvnportal vorig jaar
Manitobans who ran in the Boston Marathon on Monday say they were shocked when a couple of bombs exploded nearby, killing three people and injuring many more.Powered by NewsLook.com Producer : CBC
137 views
